task.title: Complete a Time Off Request in Time Off and Allowances
task.shortdesc: Employees can complete a time off request using the Time Off and Allowances feature.

context.note:
Depending on your company configuration, the dashboard may display different balances:
Total Accrual - Time accrued to date.
Carry Over - Hours carried over from the previous calendar year.
Used - Time used so far in the current calendar year.
Current Balance - Hours available for use.
Pending Balance - Balance available after any pending requests are approved.
Planned - Hours planned off or still in pending status.
End of Year - Hours expected to be accumulated by the end of the calendar year.

step.cmd: From the Time Off and Allowances Dashboard, select Create Request.
On the Request page, select the policy type and enter the start and end dates.

image.alt: Time Off and Allowances Request Page

step.cmd: If the request is for a partial day, select the Request a Partial Day check box.

step.stepresult:
The time off request now displays in the Planned Requests section. The request remains in pending approval status until it is approved or rejected. The time off request also appears on the History page (Time Off and Allowances > History > Requests tab).Time Off and Allowances History Page
To cancel a request, select the request link from either the dashboard or the History page. The Request page appears; select Cancel Request.
